entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Profile

I am an undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science and Technology, supervised by Prof. Xuan Song, in the CS department of Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech).

My research mainly focuses on Smart cites & AI, including trajectory prediction, reinforcement learning, and federal learning. I am also interested in multimodal task, such as generating controllable content from text.

Education

Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech) Sept. 2019 ‑ Jun. 2023

  • B.S. in Computer Science and Technology, Department of Computer Science and Engineering

  • GPA: 3.72 / 4.00

  • Supervisor: Prof. Xuan Song( Associate Professor)

National University of Singapore (NUS) May. 2022 ‑ Jul. 2022

  • Course: Artificial Intelligence of Things

  • Grade: A‑ [Transcript & Certification]

  • A Smart Wardrobe based on temperature prediction and image classification is developed, combined with Internet of things technology, machine learning and software engineering.

Publications

Xuan Song, Shibo Zhu, Defan Feng, Xingyu Chen, and Jiawen Zhu. Dispatching method, device, equipment and storage medium . (CN). 202211095230.1 . 2022/09/08. Southern University of Science and Technology. (pending)

Research Experience

Personalized Federate Learning of Trajectory Prediction ( Since Oct. 2022)

  • Supervised by Associate Professor Xuan Song
  • Proposed basing on the framework of FML algorithm, unifying social-LSTM or transformer to complete the task of personalized pedestrian trajectory prediction in multiple scenarios. I am recently working on how to implement this idea.

End‑to‑End Text‑to‑Poster Generation ( Since Sept. 2022)

  • Supervised by Assitant Professor Bo Tang

  • Working on text to image task, including measure the similarity between texts and images as well as generating a relevant picture by words.

Emergency Rescue Plan Formulation and Management Method based on Real‑Time Hierarchical Division ( Since Aug. 2022)

  • Supervised by Associate Professor Xuan Song

  • Using data‑driven methods to plan rescue areas under major disasters; Participating in patent writing

Metro Intelligent Dispatching Optimization based on Reinforcement Learning ( Sept. 2021 - Jun. 2022)

  • Supervised by Associate Professor Xuan Song

  • It is improved on the basis of DQN and successfully applied in the optimization of subway departure schedule and formed a patent

Honors & Awards

Outstanding Student Backbone (twice) (both in 2022 & 2021)

  • Awarded by SUSTech to students who make great contribution to students activities

The First Prize of Outstanding Students Scholarship (Nov. 2021)

  • Awarded by SUSTech to the top 5% students for excellent performance in the last academic year

Outstanding Volunteer (2021)

Outstanding Youth League Member (2021)

The 2𝑛𝑑 Prize of ”Huashu Cup” National Undergraduate Mathematical Modeling Competition (2021)

The 3rd Prize of National Undergraduate Mathematical Modeling Competition (Guangdong) (2021)

The 3rd Prize of Outstanding Students Scholarship (Nov. 2020)

The 3rd Prize of Admission Scholarship (Nov. 2019)

  • Awarded by SUSTech to students who earned high scores in the College Entrance Examination

Profile

I am an undergraduate student majoring in Computer
